pageTitle: Prime Ministerâ€™s itinerary for Monday, November 30, 2020 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Ottawa, Ontario

Private meetings.

The Prime Minister will speak with President and CEO of the Laurentian Bank of Canada, Rania Llewellyn.

The Prime Minister will chair the Cabinet meeting.

4:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will attend the Fall Economic Statement speech, to be delivered by the Deputy Prime Minister and Minister of Finance Chrystia Freeland in the House of Commons.

7:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will take part in a conversation with Harnarayan Singh, as part of a virtual event celebrating Guru Nanak Dev Ji Gurpurab. Minister of Diversity and Inclusion and Youth Bardish Chagger, Minister of Innovation, Science and Industry Navdeep Bains, and Minister of National Defence Harjit Sajjan will also participate in the event.

Closed to media.
